message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I think a 60-40 split in my favor is fairer, as the money will be worth less to me in the next round. Let's make a deal.
I'm not willing to give you 60% of the money. I'll make a counteroffer in the next round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think this is a fairer split considering the inflation.
